{{evento.eventoId}} {{evento.tema}} {{evento.local}} {{evento.dataEvento}} {{evento.qtdPessoas}} {{evento.lote}}

Nenhum evento encontrado!
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = []; widthImg: number = 50; marginImg: number = 2; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error), ); } }
